name: dropkickpikachu
text: Philippe steering with his mouth is just amazing.

name: mikebox
text: No no no, he fing pulls a J-TURN with his mouth!

name: daidai
text:
He drives better than I do when I use my arms.

I would have died in this situation.

name: tripperday
text: True. A lesser artist would drawn Phillipe driving with his flippers.

name: centipede_damascus
text: It doesn't even occur to him to try to get his arms out of his costume, he is so frightened.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
I don't think he can get his arms out unless he takes off the whole costume
I dunno if thats what it's supposed to look like or whoever made it was just a really shit costume maker (Teodor I'd bet)

name: trotz
text: dude... it's supposed to look like a Bee

name: aelindil
text: Bees, so far as my meager learnings in entomology have taught me, do in fact have legs.  Six of them!

name: dysphemism
text: Is it ridiculous that this is my fourth time through the archive and this is the first time I've actively noticed that Phillipe is still wearing his costume? I really have no idea how my subconscious explained the wings and the stripes and the armlessness before.

name: clembot
text: how did he start the ignition?

name: zefiel
text: Kicking it until his foot turned it

name: fancyrat
text: Holy SHIT! I absolutely didn't notice that until now. Major props to Onstad for not forgetting that bit.

name: shoinan
text: A solid 5 for this storyline for making my girlfriend cry. Ha Ha Ha!

name: macdaddyw
text: That's always good

name: mcnubbins
text: If I'm not seeing this wrong, Philippe pulled a reverse 180 using his mouth.

name: thatskotkid
text: This is because Philippe has wicked sack.

name: wittyname
text: A comment left by wittyname was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CygnusX-1, thehempfandango, jollysaintpete, hellsfruition, SpinyNorman, hellofditties, eRiUukFJk, sp1derbaby)

name: mikeronomicon
text: It's true, Billy Idol's ghost gave Philipe stones of steel.

name: wae
text: Phillipe busts a j-turn with his mouth. No three-point nonsense for this sacked-up otter.

name: simms
text: A comment left by simms was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, TonyHighwind, rowboat, Wulvaine, cailetshadow, stormagnet, LRosetw8, SotiCoto)

name: snowman
text: I got it, and it was funny.

name: lrosetw8
text:
SCREEEEE!

Philippe makes J-turns cute!

name: prolefeed5
text: It kind of creeps me out to think of what Nice Pete would have done if he had caught up with Phillipe before he peeled out... which I have no idea what, but it still creeps me out.

name: echidnaboy
text: He would have bought Philippe a delicious ice cream.

name: prolefeed5
text: Yeah, you're probably right... nevermind.

name: tomsonlocal
text: I think my first driving lesson looked something like that.

name: c_dizzle
text: The eyebrows! The eyebrows!

name: soticoto
text: Is it really so amusing that Philippe only really freaks out when he notices it IS a real secret ice-cream shop... but has a scary vendor dude?

name: canusdivinus
text: Philippe has some well made shoes going on there.

name: brokeaccount
text:
If Philippe ever loses his way and starts upon a life of crime he could go far...

[IMGS OFF]

name: lrosetw8
text: Nice

name: skaterpix
text: Philippe is my all time hero now!

name: mikeronomicon
text: Run Philipe, run!

name: fadex
text: Damn man, Phillipe has some fly kicks.

name: rheabird13
text: lucky thing this is not a stick shift.

name: wim9k
text:
Please excuse the intrusion. I am from the future. I am testing a url.

Bristol Palin

name: wim9k
text: cool.  it worked.  thank you.  carry on
